section.title: opportunities master list of List Opportunities
section.para: To access the master list of Opportunities, select the "List Opportunities" option. The following screen will appear.
When reviewing Opportunities in the master list, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to include inactive Opportunities in the display.

section.para: To the far right of the list, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
Opens screen for creating a new Opportunity.

Enables you to edit highlighted Opportunities. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Opportunity—except that when editing, the fields will contain Opportunity information. Double-clicking on an Opportunity will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight an Opportunity and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight an Opportunity and then select this button to remove the Opportunity from the list.
